Pre-Game Insights: Denver looks to keep its four-game win streak alive when the Nuggets take on Dallas.
Nuggets: Vlatko Cancar: day to day (ankle), Aaron Gordon: out (calf), DaRon Holmes II: out for season (achilles).
Mavericks: Dante Exum: out (wrist), Dereck Lively II: out (shoulder), P.J. Washington Jr.: out (knee), Maxi Kleber: out (hamstring).
